title: Tic Tac Toe: Memory Mode
howToPlayDesc:
Tic Tac Toe with a twist! You can only have 3 marks on the board at a time.
When you place a 4th, your oldest piece disappears. You can't place a piece where one still exists â€” you must wait for it to disappear.
Use this timing to your advantage and outsmart your opponent!
currentMode: Highlights oldest piece of the current player
clickToSwitch: Click the brain/skull icon in the corner to switch modes.
